head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FRIEDEL, ALLAN H.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FRIEDEL, ALLAN H.

block.p: FRIEDEL-Allan H. On June 22, 2000, at age 77. Of Boca Raton FL. Formerly of Rockville Centre, NY. Beloved husband for 53 years to Phyllis, cherished father to Ellen Cohen, Donald Cohen, Bonnie and Peter Stein, and Lisa and Steven Okyle. Adored Pop-Pop to Dana, Lindsey, Courtney, Meredith, Ellis, Carly, Jeffrey, Lisa, and Taylor. Loving brother to Marion and Eddie DeFlice and Alice and Hi Stolman. Loving uncle and great uncle. Our time together was much too short, but so very precious. Pleasant dreams and God bless you. Services Friday, June 23, 11 AM at Congregation B'nai Israel, Boca Raton.

Our time together was much too short, but so very precious. Pleasant dreams and God bless you. Services Friday, June 23, 11 AM at Congregation B'nai Israel, Boca Raton.
